tool_description: The Technology Mash Email Validator [Also Test Delivery Check] API is a powerful and sophisticated tool designed to validate and verify email addresses in real-time. It's an essential solution for businesses and developers who require accurate email validation to enhance email deliverability, reduce bounce rates, and maintain the integrity of their mailing lists.
name: Technology Mash Email Validator
title: Technology Mash Email Validator

api_list.name: Check Email Validity and if can be delivered
api_list.description: Add Email as a Parameter and get a successful or error response.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-mash-email-validator.p.rapidapi.com/checkEmail/samsauhard1@gmail.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-mash-email-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://technology-mash-email-validator.p.rapidapi.com/checkEmail/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "technology-mash-email-validator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
